description: This file implements the WindowManagerConnector class, which manages interaction with the WindowManager interface, including plugin initialization, display creation, and retrieving display information. It also defines a nested notification class for handling window manager events.

classes.name: WindowManagerConnector
classes.description: Manages connection to the window management system, handles plugin lifecycle, display creation, and display info retrieval.

methods.name: ~WindowManagerConnector
methods.description: Destructor that handles cleanup of resources.

methods.name: initializePlugin
methods.description: Initializes the connection to the WindowManager service.

methods.name: releasePlugin
methods.description: Releases resources and unregisters from WindowManager.

methods.name: createDisplay
methods.description: Creates a display with given application instance, display name, user ID, and group ID.

methods.name: isPluginInitialized
methods.description: Returns whether the plugin has been successfully initialized.

methods.name: getDisplayInfo
methods.description: Retrieves display-related information such as XDG directory and Wayland display name.

classes.name: WindowManagerNotification
classes.description: Nested class handling window manager event notifications, such as user inactivity.
